title: Dark images darken the entire page
content: I am using light visual mode. Whenever I am viewing a dark image, e.g. a relatively dark photo in a newspaper article, this darkens the entire page, including the menu/bar area. This happens as the dark image is scrolled to become visible. Normal bright views are restored once the dark image is out of view. And similarly my youtube music page, which has a black background, is horribly black now. I a musing windows11. Thanks.
creator: istvan821

title: Account sign in
content: I have been trying to sign into my account here on FireFox with my Gmail account, and my password has not been working. When I sign into my account on other browsers my password works. Why wont it work on FireFox? Thanks, David

title: Account Data did not sync after re-login
content:
Hi - Wondering if anyone has ideas on how to fix this and recover my bookmarks:

1) Had to reset my Windows 10 laptop which uninstalled Firefox. 2) When I reinstalled firefox and logged into my account, none of my extensions, bookmarks downloaded or synced 3) I synced my phone (logged into my account correctly with my data) to the firefox on my computer (via QR code), hoping that would fix my laptop's browser syncing issue. Instead it deleted all my phone's firefox bookmarks when it synced with my computer (ugh!)

Is there a way to recover my bookmarks from my phone's firefox or they are all lost? My phone's firefox still has the history but no longer my bookmarks.

Thanks!
creator: scware12

title: non riesco più recuperare il codoce di back up ed ho dei problemi con l'accont
content:
Ho 2 distinti problemi ma cheprobabilmente hanno avuto la stessa origine. Nel tentativo di installare il browser su un laptop con win10 ho avuto diverse difficoltà a settare l'accont. 1) Adesso quando vado sull'accont sul laptop con win10 e talvolta anche su altri dispositivi appare in continuazione "sessione scaduta". Inoltre, non riconosce i codici dell'app per l'autenticaizone a 2 fattori; 2) Infine, non riesco più recuperare il codice di back up

Grazie

Giampiero Di Pasquale
creator: pierodipa

title: Video impossible for weeks on Firefox but also Chrome
content: Firefox and also Chrome can't play Youtube or Youtube TV video without major stuttering. If there's someone talking it's out of sync. Choppy video. I tried emptying the cache but nothing changed. I've started using Edge Browser, which I never used before, and it can play these videos fine. I regret having to switch to it because Firefox was so customized for me. Is there a solution for this? Thanks.
creator: piedblues01

title: Kindle library lost on android phone
content: I was reading on my Android phone and suddenly lost my entire library. How do I get it back on my phone? I can see them in my Amazon accout on my desk top but back injury doesn't let me sit at my desk for long periods. Any suggestions?
creator: marionddavis
